short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create professional browser recordings with zoom in effect.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Chrome extension for professional browser recordings. Perfect for product demos, updates, and tutorials.

Main functions:
1) Auto scale up/down upon element interaction
We track cursor actions and apply zoom in/out to make the video more interactive

2) Customizable cursor icon with smooth movements
Select the cursor size and speed before the recording is started

3) Customizable background
–°hoose a background from already collected sets or set your own color
